items.sentence: I know that Tom isn't old enough to do that.
I know that Tom isn't capable of doing that.
I know that Tom is too old to be doing that.
I know that Tom is strong enough to do that.
My brother has a part-time job in a library.
The woman sitting under that tree looks sad.
A policeman asked me if something was wrong.
What made you think that you had to do that?
Do you really think that Tom has to do that?
Do you think that Tom will let Mary do that?
I think that we should force Tom to do that.
Do you think that Tom might like to do that?
I already sent an email to the support team.
I have to set my watch back. It's very fast.
I watched a movie with my friend in my room.
I don't have a great deal of money to spend.
I went out for a walk to get some fresh air.
I don't understand what you guys are saying.
I want to hire a guide who can speak French.
I use all kinds of software to study French.
